sentence.Network_en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentence.Network_en: The worst thing you can do is underestimate an opponent.
sentence.Network_cn: 最严重的错误就是低估对手。

sentence.Network_en: His cunning and guile were not attributes I would ever underestimate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从未对他的狡猾和奸诈掉以轻心。

list.abs: Never underestimate your power to change yourself !, 永远不要低估你改变自我的能力!
Unfortunately , they underestimated the threat they faced., 不幸的是 , 他们低估了他们所面临的威胁.
a headstone rises on the mound , with just four words engraved on it : they underestimated the Titans .坟堆前的墓石上只刻了几个字：它们低估了泰坦。
When you are going downhill you tend to underestimate yourself ., 当人生走下坡的时候 , 你趋向与低估自己.
与艾滋病有关的英文词汇语句段落_爱问知识人 ... 地方病 endemic 低估数据 an underestimate 地位的象征 status symbol.

entry.def: If you underestimate something, you do not realize how large or great it is or will be.

example.ex: None of us should ever underestimate the degree of difficulty women face in career advancement...
example.tran: 我们谁都不应该低估女性在事业发展过程中所面临的困难程度。

example.ex: Never underestimate what you can learn from a group of like-minded people.
example.tran: 千万不要低估你从一群志趣相投的人那里所能学到的东西。

entry.def: If you underestimate someone, you do not realize what they are capable of doing.

example.ex: I think a lot of people still underestimate him...
example.tran: 我觉得很多人仍然低估了他。

example.ex: The first lesson I learnt as a soldier was never to underestimate the enemy.
example.tran: 作为一名士兵，我学到的第一课就是决不要低估敌人。

means.word_mean: 1. an estimation that is too low; an estimate that is less than the true or actual value
1. assign too low a value to;

sentences.sentence: "Don't underestimate the value of this heirlooom-you may sell it at a good price"
"The construction company wanted the contract badly and lowballed"

means.word_mean: 3. make too low an estimate of;

sentences.sentence: "he underestimated the work that went into the renovation"
"Don't underestimate the danger of such a raft trip on this river"

auth_sentence.content: Don't underestimate the best of British, either.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't underestimate the best of British, either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't underestimate the best of British, either.

auth_sentence.content: I do not underestimate the scale of the challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: I do not underestimate the scale of the challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I do not underestimate the scale of the challenge.

auth_sentence.content: This seems to underestimate the originality of the book.
auth_sentence.res_content: This seems to underestimate the originality of the book.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This seems to underestimate the originality of the book.

Sentence.sentence: Its role has been largely underestimated.

sentences.en: I underestimate the distance, and am exhausted.
sentences.cn: 没想到这么远, 我可累坏了。

jushi.english: You underestimated the young man's ability.
jushi.chinese: 你低估了这个年轻人的能力。

jushi.english: We had a serious underestimate of losses in the earthquake.
jushi.chinese: 你们对地震中遭受的损失估计严重不足。
